reviewText: This item is NOT affiliated with Prince in ANY way.. it is however a great collection of interviews and such that I might not have otherwise ever seen. If you are a Prince fan, this is a MUST HAVE.  I was also thrilled with the service, as this arrived at my door super fast!

The collector's box includes Prince the glory years which is the exact same dvd as Prince in the 80's.
The other dvd with the interviews was enjoyable.
Not very pleased with the purchase.

Wwas Not Happy with this Prince box set, I thought there would be concert footage herein somewhere... NOPE !
Like already stated here in the reviews ... compilation of interviews, which if I wanted to, could pluck them right off the net ... Nowwww to continue lookN for Prince ... LIVE !!!
loved it

Disappointed with these CD's.  They are Prince's music which is the best, but nothing new.
The arrangements didn't seem to flow like the albums that Prince put out.
item was returned
Enjoy listening to him so much.

Very disappointed to open this box set to find that one of the dvds is PRINCE IN HIS OWN WORDS ( which I also purchased at the same time , so now I have two ) and PRINCE THE GLORY YEARS ( which I already owned, so now I have two ) . I did not see the titles of the dvds that were in the box set listed anywhere , or I would not of purchased it.
I loved it
Loved everything about this. Any true fan would be excited to add this to their collection.
These things actually make sweet music
Perfect
love prince
I liked the product
awesome
What can I say? Princes legacy speaks for itself.
Being a lover of Prince my entire life, I enjoyed the interviews that were featured on here. I've seen these interviews before, but having them in one place on DVD is good move. Thanks so very much.
He is my favorite person ever!!!

Very poor quality film. You can see for free on prime the glory years which is one of the disc set.
You can see most of the interviews for free on you tube
Awesome!
Its Prince and I love him what else can I say...
Excellent
Loved it
THIS DVD WAS GOOD
The DVD collection came in just as I expected but did not finish watching it just yet.  Still not over the tragedy of his death.  Another great one gone too soon.

I'm disappointed in this purchase. I thought these dads would show Prince's life more with past interviews, performances, etc. Well, it was a documentary, which I also wanted; but the documentary part has been covered in the past and this is mostly what this was. It was a very boring documentary at that. If you like others opinions while they scrutinize Prince's life, you would like this. I was expecting so much more. It was so boring that I had to take the first disc out after about 45 minutes. I will look to buy another one that will hopefully be better.
I found this to be very insightful!
I love most things Prince related.
It is the best thing I ever had, all because it is Prince.  I love it
I haven't watched it yet,but I'm sure it's great...It's PRINCE!
A Friend of Prince will enjoy this in their collection!
I love Prince, hated the dvd, very poorly made, it did not play all the way through
It is Prince!

Don't waste your money! You can see the entire interviews on youtube. Very little of Prince mostly people talking about him and his career. The DVD of Prince is old interviews and some are of very poor quality. I wish I could return the DVDs. There are better interviews with Prince himself on youtube.com  with better visuals!
Awesome. So glad I bought this for my collection.
Love Prince! RIP
Prince at his finest.  A collection that all fans of Prince should own.
Have not viewed it yet, but I'm sure  it's awsome
beautiful

Although many of the interviews are viewable on YouTube, it was nice to see at least eight of them compiled on the second DVD.  I personally enjoyed watching the first DVD (of the his early years) and putting faces with the names that are speaking about their professional relationships with him.  It was a great to watch again and to have this in my personal collection.
great dvd
2 DVDs that are great, especially for Prince fans.  I really LOVE the one "In his own words".  The interviews are just great!
Great
IF this is as good as advertised, NO PRINCE fan should NOT have this in their collection.
love.....
Gone too soon!!!
Excellent
Great product and received way sooner than expected.
Great to see and hear such personal comments.  A true Prince fan will love this box set, even if they have other similar ones already...
If you love Prince you love this!  Received fast and easy.
Everything PRINCE is great. I love the videos.
I was looking for music not an autobiography

Having loved Prince all of his career, I was excited to order and purchase his music and these DVD's. I was very disappointed in the footage being old clips of interviews of which the majority I already have in my library. I felt I was ripped off and would advice everyone not to buy this item.
Perefct birthday gift

Two DVDs
the first one tells the story of Prince in the 1980's when he came out with his albums
like Prince. the song I wanna be your lover
to the controversy of dirty mind and controversy to 1999 then purple rain to sign o the times
while the second one is interviews with Prince
Husband loved it

I am pleased with my recent purchase of prince - dvd collector's box, it contains a lot of interviews with prince, most of the interviews come after prince's popularity had somewhat subsided after the early years of his career and the success of his purple rain movie. in my opinion, prince fans would be better off buying prince - the glory years, prince - live at the Aladdin las vegas, and prince - in concert rave un2 the year 2000.
I chose a five star rating for this review because he is pure genius and profetically intellectual.  He is everything that I am and once was. lol...
It's a really good account of Prince's career. Good insight 2 his creative genius and into the artist himself! Fantabulous!
U can catch most of this stuff on youtube, don't waste your $$ go 2 3rd eye girl.com to see the latest and new material

I had never seen before the material presented in this 2-DVD set.  The first DVD contains commentary by engineers, and other people that have worked with him.  I was particularly moved by the candid comment by one man (I don't recall his name right now) about what the song Purple Rain meant to him.  Also, there's an interactive quiz.  It was so much fun to quiz myself how much do I know about Prince's music.
The second DVD has eight interviews with Prince by Tavis Smiley, Carson Daly and international interviewers.  I liked Prince's warmth, humor, and wisdom.

For the price I paid thought it would have more music videos, mainly more like documentary and interviews, was a gift as well for someone.  Should have read the description thoroughly.  Thought more detailed videos would be included in the DVD collection.
My wife, a Prince fan, loved it.  I don't think she even knew this collection existed. Glad I tripped over it.
It turned out to be a documentary that I had already seen. I expected more music and or videos. I don't think it was advertised correctly.

I never collected prince things before in the past so I was glad to have this gem others that may have collected prince dvd's in the past may have the footage already this dvd set has two dvd's and one of them is the "glory years" which I didn't have already so this was economical buy for me and as I recall the other dvd 's were interviews in his own words  I real glad to have this 2 dic set
and prince is just another genius that I enjoy god bless him

This box set is horrible! I was expecting videos and live footage from Prince. What you get are boring interviews & more boring interviews on the first dvd. On the second it's just interviews from Prince, that I'm sure that everyone has seen. I was very disappointed with the box set and would not recommend it to anyone.
It's great 4 any Prince fan. Who's really a Fan and appreciates the man and his music. Showing him being himself
Came ahead of schedule and in time for Chirstmas.  I loved the fact that it came out just before the holidays this way I knew my sister did not have this one.
Truly enjoyed the in-depth interviews of the musical genius! Prince Rodgers Nelson, Prince, the symbol  is truly one of the greatest musicians of all time!!!
One of the DVDs was a copy from a VHS tape, and it was a bad copy.  I liked the content, but I was expecting more conversations w/ Prince and that was not the case.

The content is 2 DVDs. The first is what others have said of him [Prince the glory years].  Participants rave his collection of songs.  However to hear Prince in his own words from various interviews post Warner bros, is a treasure.  Especially the interviews between him and Tavis smiley.  Enjoy
Horrible, what a disappointment.  This is more interview with other people.  The tile is not really as stated. Prince is not in this much at all!
what can you say it's Prince interviews The Glory Years and In HIs Own Words.  LOVE.
I liked the  end the most. Little to no music and a poor documentary.
good
All this was is recorded interviews from the media but it does have an interesting quiz on it of how well you know Prince.
Loved the movies
It was good until I put the other dvd in a it didn't play not happy,  seem like a scam maybe.
loved it but didn't know came with movies already ordered..needs to be clearer.
Just love Prince, what can I say?
I love to binge on Prince.  These DVDs allow you it hear about Prince's professional life from the professional he worked and see some of Princes television interviews.
Thank you #Amazon Smile for delivering this today, Wednesday, and not Saturday, April 1st.  Best #AprilFools ever!!!
